div.h2: HSPC Weight Units of Measure Value Set

div.p: The list of codes that describe the mass units used for weight.
Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from UCUM. Implementer use of UCUM is not covered by this agreement
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://unitsofmeasure.org
CodeDisplay
[lb_av]Pound [mass]
[oz_av]Ounce [mass]
kgKilogram [SI Mass Units]
gGram [mass]

name.value: HSPC Weight Units of Measure Value Set

description.value: The list of codes that describe the mass units used for weight.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from UCUM. Implementer use of UCUM is not covered by this agreement
